sentences.sContent: I got out of the car to inspect the damage.
The building is regularly inspected by the fire-safety officer.
sentences.sCn: 消防安全官定期巡视这座大楼。

remMethod.val: in(进入)+spect(看)→深入地看→检查， 视察

words.tran: 检查员；视察团；检查员的辖区

trans.tranOther: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it
